about_the_game:
Give your male Japanese characters even more voices to be heard with Japanese Anime Voices: Male Character Series Vol.8 from TK Projects!

Following the very popular Japanese Anime Voice series, this pack will expand your project with more and more exciting and fun Japanese male anime-voices speaking very usable Japanese phrases!

Bring your anime characters to life with these common, everyday vocal phrases for Level up, Suspicious, Joy, Feel down, Hand over and many, many more!

FEATURES:

* 126 Japanese animation-like male voices (phrases)
* OGG, M4A formats included
* Male voices (in Japanese phrases) for Visual Novel Games, RPG and much more!
* English translation list included
* For use in RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

1. 001_Start1.wav いこ Let's go
2. 002_Start2.wav さて Now then
3. 003_Victory1.wav よし Alright
4. 004_Victory2.wav こんなもんかな That it?
5. 005_Follow1.wav はい Got it
6. 006_Follow2.wav わかった Understood
7. 007_Choice1.wav どうする? What do we do?
8. 008_Choice2.wav 指示を Your orders
9. 009_Runaway1.wav 逃げよう Let's flee
10. 010_Runaway2.wav じゃあね See you
11. 011_Tool use1.wav 使うよ Using this
12. 012_Tool use2.wav どうぞ Take it

30. 030_Large damage5.wav すごくいたい That really hurt
31. 031_No damage1.wav いたくない Doesn't hurt at all
32. 032_No damage2.wav きかない That did nothing
33. 033_Weak attack1.wav えいっ Ey-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Give your male Japanese characters even more voices to be heard with Japanese Anime Voices: Male Character Series Vol.8 from TK Projects!
